title: Request to Riot about the boards
body: When content is removed / edited and you're sent a warning for it could it be possible to disclose the certain post in the warning? that way if you make multiple posts then it'll be easier to tell which one is being talked about, something I think would help with the overall clarity of the boards.

replies.body:
It doesn't?

I thought that would be a no-brainer.

gj rito
